    U

    unlock() - Method in class Room
    Method to unlock a room
    unlock_LockedRoom_BecomesAccessible() - Method in class RoomTest
    Tests room unlocking mechanism.
    unlockDoor() - Method in class GearLock
    Method used to unlock the door mechanism, used after all gear pieces are inserted, unlocking the lockedRoom(Laboratory in this case)
    unlockPrompt - Variable in class Lock
    Message for if the player unlocks the lock
    update() - Method in class GameGUI
    Method used to regularly update the game's attributes, based on player's current location and situation
    update() - Method in class HidingSpotManager
    Method used to update the game(updating the player's status)
    updateCanvasSize() - Method in class GameGUI
    Method used to update the canvas' size
    updateDisplay() - Method in class InventoryGUI
    Method used to update the inventory's display
    updateInventorySize() - Method in class InventoryGUI
    Method used to update the inventory's grid size based on the inventory's capacity
    updatePosition() - Method in class Player
    Method used to update the player's position
    updateStamina(double, boolean) - Method in class Player
    Method used to update the player's stamina
    updateTooltipPosition(double, double) - Method in class InventoryGUI
    Method used to update the tooltip's position
    updateWalkCycle(boolean) - Method in class Player
    Method used to update the player's walk cycle
    use(Player) - Method in class Ammo
    Method used to describe the usage of ammo
    use(Player) - Method in class Batteries
    Override method use, specifies what's supposed to happen upon using the item Batteries(Player's Flashlight, if owned, will get fully recharged and the Batteries item will be used)
    use(Player) - Method in class Cassette
    Override method, used to specify, what happens upon using the Cassette(If the player is located in one of the save locations, he will get a menu, if not, he will be warned about his misuse of the item)
    use(Player) - Method in class Flashlight
    Use method, specifically made for the in-combat use(Blinding the enemy with a flashlight), or Cellar SS
    use(Player) - Method in class HealingItem
    Method used to determine what happens upon using the healing item
    use(Player) - Method in class Hint
    Implements what's supposed to occur upon using the Hint item(Prints the item's description)
    use(Player) - Method in class Item
    Method used to implement the item's behavior
    use(Player) - Method in class KeyItem
    Method used to implement the use/effects of the KeyItem
    use(Player) - Method in class Knife
    Method to implement the use of the weapon 'Knife'
    use(Player) - Method in class Pistol
    Use method, implements Pistol's behavior upon use, contains super from Weapon class
    use(Player) - Method in class RepairTool
    Method used to implement repair tool's behavior when used
    use(Player) - Method in class Shotgun
    Method configuring the shotgun's behavior upon being used
    use(Player) - Method in class Weapon
    Method to implement the use of a said weapon
    useBattery(int) - Method in class Flashlight
    Method for using the Flashlight's battery(Flashlight can only be used in the Cellar stealth sequence, that's why the condition)
    UseCommand - Class in Unnamed Package
    Class used to implement the Use command(for items)
    UseCommand(Player, Item) - Constructor for class UseCommand
    Constructor
    useFlashlight() - Method in class CombatSystem
    Simulates the 'Blind enemy with flashlight' option, allowing the player to blind the enemy for 1 turn, if the requirements had been met
    useHealingItem() - Method in class CombatSystem
    Simulates the 'Use Healing item' choice, allowing the player to use any healing item in his inventory, healing himself for a bit of health
